import React from 'react' import Headx from '../components/Headx' import { Container, Row, Col, Card, CardImg, CardBody, CardTitle, Alert} from 'reactstrap' function career() { return ( Career There are currently no vacancies available.
However, we are always keen to meet energetic and talented professionals who would like to join our team.
If you wish to be considered for any future positions, please send your CV and cover letter to : business@faisalnazriassociates.com ) } export default career
